website_summaries.verdict: Everything about this phone places it in a class by itself, including its long-lasting battery, cameras, storage ceiling, and durability.
pros: 5-inch full HD screen with Corning Gorilla glass 5
IP68 certified waterproof to 2 meters for up to 60 minutes
cons: Button configuration makes it easy to accidentally dial someone

customer_reviews.text: It may not be the "smartest" smartphone but you can bludgeon any other phone to death with this bad boy. I'm pretty clumsy and this is the only phone I haven't managed to wreck. December 2018 I answered a phone call in a hot tub and failed to secure the headphone jack. The phone shut off and wouldn't turn back on. I ordered a replacement (same phone). About a week later I tried turning on the water damaged one and BOOM that bad MFer had come straight back to life and is going strong one year later. Best part is that since I have two now I only have to charge my phone/s like once a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough little bugger.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so far. The battery life is superb, I regularly lose maybe 20% charge a day. I had the unfortunate honor of testing both the water/dust proofing depth and drop rating all in one day, and it passed both with flying colors. I have not even needed to use the included battery pack, or the earbuds, but glad I have them in reserve. The camera's low light quality is acceptable, but nothing to brag about.
customer_reviews.author: David Femmel

customer_reviews.title: will update review when it comes back from repair. (Been out for 2 months already)
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 months received an android update which corrupted the OS. Contacting cat support is no easy task. Phone is out for warranty repair hopefully they can sort it out. husband loved it for the short time he had it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone. It has a rugged durable feel to it. Definitely not a phone you want to buy for mobile gaming. This is a working class phone, for me being military this phone is absolutely phenomenal. Although I did break the screen within the first 2 weeks of owning it. Couldn't survive a drunk night with me LOL, but it does still work after falling 3 stories just cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: Great but has some hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully durable, just as advertised, only problem we have run into is the device does NOT do well in the cold. 35 degrees and the phone shuts down unless in a pocket near body heat. The software is a little wonky with the BluTooth connection; it doesn't adjust sound correctly (tested with multiple devices) and will drop a call if connected to another device.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cullen Walker

customer_reviews.title: A great set up
customer_reviews.text: My husband can not destroy this one! Fast to charge, the flashlight with it is great with the extra battery. A souped up Android that withstands the pressure
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood Flower

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Super tough and durable, I never got the earbuds, phone works alright, Ive had to do a couple factory resets because the whole system freaked. Definitely a strong phone which is what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sub standard
customer_reviews.text: The reason it is a bad phone i bought it in June 8 2018 it is now March 2019 and the phone is a paperweight, it will not come on and stay on and when it does the screen is pixelated. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money don't buy one
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with these phones this phone is junk completely slow service sucks don't waste your money the only thing good about it is the battery the rest is complete waste
customer_reviews.author: Gator dog

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but should have got the twin Sim card ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but should have got the twin Sim card version as this package is only a single Sim card
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, very water resistent.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for people that work outside a lot and are in wet, rainy environments. Certainly not a fancy phone like Samsungs galaxy phones. The camera is not picture photograph quality. I use my wife's iphone for family pictures. Pictures are good enough for most situations. You're not paying a thousand dollars for this phone, remember. I dropped the cat 41 in the swimming pool. Under water only 30 seconds. All is well. If the phone is to be used underwater there is a setting change to make. Great phone for one who works outside, drops there phone (A LOT), and just needs a rugged phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: Poorly functioning
customer_reviews.text: This phone has poor service and no wifi calling feature. As cool as it is, it is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best rugged phone reasonable fast and dear God it takes annything
customer_reviews.author: David Osler

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this s for about 6 months after dropping about 3drops of water on a Sony Xperia. Needed something a little more durable. I think I could drive nails with this thing. Lots of memory and durable. I would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Picture are misleading
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would come with a rugged battery pack like the one in the picture but it a regular. Power pack ... Kinda scared to drop it... But other then that only complaint is the camera lag. But as far as ruggedness it seem to be durable Enough
customer_reviews.author: Gamaliel Navarro-palacios

customer_reviews.title: won't activate screen when call comes in so you miss the call
customer_reviews.text: they did an upgrade of the software and it hasn't been reliable since. the techs had me go into a few menus and clear some stuff and it worked again for about a week and now I missed an important call today because I couldn't answer it (how does that work, it rings but the display stays off?) I ordered a new phone today and this one is going to the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: CAT won't allow root
customer_reviews.text: At the sale price of $349 for this bundle, this is a tempting deal. But CAT said, in an official communication, that it will not support root. Even if they charged a surplus for root and even if you sign away warranty rights for bricking. So will have to vote with my wallet and not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: ErgonomicMike

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Ever, 2 bad i missed it
customer_reviews.text: what a great deal on such a great phone, too bad i missed it by one day! I had the money too late! Guys if there is an extra deal please contact me at newpete17@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Pedro L.

product_meta.title: CAT S41 Rugged Waterproof Smartphone with Active Urban Rugged Earphones and Power Bank
feature_bullets: Powerful 5000 mAh non-removable lithium ion battery providing up to 44 days of standby time and 38 hours of 3G talk time
IP68 certified waterproof up to 2 meters (6.5 feet) for 60 minutes; Shock and drop proof military standard up to 1.8 meters (6 feet)
Super bright Full HD 1980x1080 display with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 can be read in direct sunlight and can be used when wet or with gloved hands.
13 MP rear camera with autofocus and 8 MP front camera, with 1080p video capture at 30 fps
3GB RAM, 32GB internal storage, expandable with Micro SD up to 2TB Compatible with CAT phones 2 year warranty and display protection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars33 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
